code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarCard=_ref=>{let{car}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card h-100 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:car.imageUrl,className:"card-img-top",alt:`${car.year} ${car.make} ${car.model}`,style:{height:'200px',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:[car.year," ",car.make," ",car.model]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"h5 text-primary",children:["$",car.price.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-muted",children:[car.mileage.toLocaleString()," miles"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-secondary me-2",children:car.transmission}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-secondary",children:car.fuelType})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text text-truncate",children:car.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-footer bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/cars/${car._id}`,className:"btn btn-primary w-100",children:"View Details"})})]});};export default CarCard;
